user_query: I want to inspire my employees with famous quotes during our team meeting from authors like Shakespeare, Einstein, and Gandhi, particularly related to leadership and perseverance.

TaskList.description: Gather quotes related to leadership and perseverance from Shakespeare.
Gather quotes related to leadership and perseverance from Einstein.
Gather quotes related to leadership and perseverance from Gandhi.
Compile all quotes collected from Shakespeare, Einstein, and Gandhi into a single document for the team meeting.
